# cortexcloud_role (Data Source)

Provides visibility into a role's access to the Cortex Cloud platform.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `pretty_name` (String) The name of the role.

### Read-Only

- `created_by` (String) The creator of the role.
- `description` (String) The description of the role.
- `groups` (List of String) The groups of the role.
- `insert_time` (Number) The insert time of the role.
- `permissions` (List of String) The permissions of the role.
- `tags` (String) The tags of the role.
- `update_time` (Number) The update time of the role.
- `users` (List of String) The users of the role.
